Text: Amarna Reign is a great Metalcore band out of Indianapolis, they still aren't very well known, if you download this album please buy it at one of their shows, or when you have the 7 dollars to get it off the internet. They need your support.
Fantastic album! I'll be buying this when I can, and seeding for everyone else.
Amazing torrent, any chance you can get their other EP "Monument" i think it is, seeding. :)
